text:
• Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) is a leader in cloud computing and AI, recognized for its outstanding ESG performance.
• Microsoft is investing in AI and the metaverse, and is a leader in the cloud and AI business.
• Microsoft released strong fiscal 2024 first-quarter results, with earnings jumping 27% year over year and revenue up 13%.
• Microsoft is the world's second-most valuable company with a market capitalization of $2.5 trillion.
• Microsoft is a potential candidate for a stock split, and is a holding of the Action Alerts PLUS portfolio.
• Amazon.com is competing with Microsoft and Google in the AI market, and reported strong third quarter results.
